properties.address: The Green, Amington, Tamworth, Staffs B77 4AD
properties.description: Place of Welcome opens EVERY Thursday 2-4pm (apart from Christmas holidays) for drinks, cakes, quizzes, jigsaws and occasional craft, all ages welcome - free of charge, donations welcome. Baby Ark is a Stay and Play for Babies and their carers - Monday 1:30 - 3:00pm Term time ONLY and The Amington Ark is for Pre-schoolers and their carers - Thursday morning 9:00 - 11:30am Term time ONLY. Find us on Facebook to book a space for the Ark activities.
properties.title: Amington Parish Church

properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 9th November 2023** Church Hall offering tea, coffee, cup-a-soup, biscuits. A warm social space, free for all. With jigsaws, games and books swap.
properties.title: Arley Warm hub

properties.address: Warwickshire County Council, Atherstone, Warwickshire CV9 1AX
properties.description: Warwickshire Libraries, offer a comfortable safe environment for everyone to use and our free services will help to keep some of your costs down. You don’t need to be a library member to visit – just pop in. Choose to spend time reading, studying, working and using free library WiFi; tackle a jigsaw, play a board game, become absorbed in mindfulness colouring or join in our free library events and activities for all ages to make friends or learn something new. https://www.warwickshire.gov.uk/directory-record/593/atherstone-library-and-information-centre
properties.title: Atherstone library

properties.address: St Martin's Church & Centre, Tamworth, Staffordshire B77 4JA
properties.description: Our coffee shop is open on Tuesday mornings and we offer refreshments after our Sunday services, anyone is welcome to come along to these! Families only on Thursdays at the Make Lunch sessions - these aren't monthly but there was no other option to choose! Dates are always in the school holidays and are advertised on our Facebook page Make Lunch Stonydelph.
